ref: Harry aliamua hatamsaidia na akaondoka.

src: I do not enjoy helping people.
mt: Sijui kushirikiana na watu.
ref: Sifurahii kuwasaidia watu.

src: Kevin thanked Stacy and they enjoyed their time at the park.
mt: Kevin alimshukuru Stacy na wakaelekea wakaelekea katika mazingira.
ref: Kevin alimshukuru Stacy na walifurahia wakati wao kwenye bustani.

src: However, Glen hugs his mother-in-law.
mt: Lakini Glen anamwaga mke wake.
ref: Walakini, Glen anamkumbatia mama mkwe wake.

src: Next week she would relax when it was all over.
mt: Japo mwanamke huyo alikuwa na shida, alikuwa na muda wa kujifungua kwa kujua kuwa kila kitu kitakuwa kama kawaida.
ref: Wiki ijayo atapumzika yatakapoisha yote.

src: We decided to return home instead.
mt: Kwa hiyo tumekubali kurejea nyumbani.
ref: Tuliamua kurudi nyumbani badala yake.

src: Her attempts at solving murders, however, were less successful.
mt: Jibu lake la kujitambua kwa kuwaua, lakini jitambulizi lake la kujitambua kwa kuwaua, ilikuwa bado.
ref: Majaribio yake ya kutatua mauaji, hata hivyo, hayakufanikiwa sana.

src: Chad scored a touchdown after asking his coach for advice.
mt: Chad alisajiliwa kama kipa baada ya kuchangamka na meneja wake.
ref: Chad ilifunga bao baada ya kumwuliza kocha wake ushauri.

src: His cheating wife called the police and he was arrested.
mt: Mke wake alikuwa akifanya kosa na alitumia polisi na kufanywa kama mgonjwa.
ref: Mke wake mdanganyifu aliita polisi na akakamatwa.

src: Ivan bought mosquito repellent for his next hike.
mt: Ivan alikataa mabwawa kwa kuuza mabwawa kwa safari yake ya kujitafutia.
ref: Ivan alinunua dawa ya mbu kwa ajili ya matembezi yake yanayofuata.

src: Paige had to rely on her friends for their support.
mt: Paige alitumia wenzake kwa ushahidi wao.
ref: Paige alilazimika kutegemea marafiki wake kwa msaada wao.

src: John was glad he asked her on a date.
mt: John alikuwa na furaha kwa kuchagua na yeye kwa kipindi cha kufanya mapambano.
ref: John alifurahi alimwomba wakutane.

src: The flute sounded beautiful.
mt: Kwa wakati, sita lilisema vizuri.
ref: Filimbi ilisikika kuwa nzuri.

src: The ride was very fun for Maggie.
mt: Kuendesha kwa Maggie ilikuwa na nafasi kubwa.
ref: Safari ilikuwa ya furaha sana kwa Maggie.
